snippet: The police had confronted the man to arrest him on a weapons charge at the suburban Milwaukee hospital.
abstract: Police in Milwaukee suburb shoot and wound man brandishing a handgun inside a children's hospital after officers tried to arrest him on a warrant inside hospital’s neonatal care unit.
lead_paragraph: The police had confronted the man to arrest him on a weapons charge at the suburban Milwaukee hospital.

headline.main: Police Shoot Man Fleeing With Gun in Wisconsin Children’s Hospital
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin: Police Shoot Man in Hospital
